title: Energy and Policy Considerations for Deep Learning in NLP
authors: Strubell E.; Ganesh A.; McCallum A.
relevance_note: Foundational paper on NLP training carbon costs; introduces GPU-hour energy estimation formula

title: Estimating the Carbon Footprint of BLOOM
authors: Luccioni A.S.; Viguier S.; Ligozat A.L.
relevance_note: Lifecycle analysis of BLOOM-176B; covers embodied + operational emissions

title: Carbon Emissions and Large Neural Network Training
relevance_note: Google analysis of training emissions across multiple large models; hardware efficiency focus

title: Green AI
authors: Schwartz R.; Dodge J.; Smith N.A.; Etzioni O.
tags: Green AI; Red AI; efficiency; reporting
relevance_note: Coins 'Red AI vs Green AI'; argues for efficiency reporting as standard practice

title: Towards the Systematic Reporting of the Energy and Carbon Footprints of ML
relevance_note: Proposes systematic ML reporting framework; covers measurement methodology gaps

title: Power Hungry Processing: Watts Driving the Cost of AI Deployment?
authors: Luccioni A.S.; Jernite Y.; Strubell E.
relevance_note: Focuses on inference-time energy; shows inference can dominate lifecycle costs at scale

title: Assessing the Carbon Footprint of NLP Methods
relevance_note: Comparative evaluation of carbon estimation tools for NLP; benchmarks CodeCarbon vs mlco2

title: Measuring the Carbon Intensity of AI in Cloud Instances
relevance_note: Measures real-time carbon intensity of cloud AI workloads; introduces spatial/temporal shifting

title: Quantifying the Carbon Emissions of Machine Learning
relevance_note: Introduces the mlco2.ai calculator; methodology for estimating training emissions from hardware specs

title: An Analysis of Deep Neural Network Models for Practical Applications
authors: Canziani A.; Paszke A.; Culurciello E.
relevance_note: Early energy benchmarking of CNN architectures; baseline for hardware energy analysis

title: Sustainable AI: Environmental Implications Challenges and Opportunities
relevance_note: Meta/Facebook system-level sustainability analysis; covers training and inference at production scale

title: Carbontracker: Tracking and Predicting the Carbon Footprint of Training Deep Learning Models
relevance_note: Introduces Carbontracker tool; real-time carbon tracking during training with prediction capability

title: Unrolling Binaries: A Systematic Review of Carbon Footprint Estimation for Deep Learning
relevance_note: Comprehensive survey of carbon estimation methodologies; identifies gaps in embodied carbon accounting

title: Environmental Report 2022
relevance_note: Corporate lifecycle emissions data for Google AI infrastructure; includes Scope 1/2/3 reporting

title: Electricity 2023 Analysis and Forecast to 2025
relevance_note: Grid carbon intensity data by country/region; essential reference for location-based emission calculations
